author: Falco Nogatz <fnogatz@gmail.com>
name: geospatial-demo
description: Example location-based app to demonstrate the power of MongoDB, node.js and Websockets

scripts.postinstall: mongoimport --db geospatial-demo --collection haltestellen --drop --jsonArray < data.json; mongo localhost/geospatial-demo --eval "db.haltestellen.ensureIndex({ 'geometry.features.geometry.coordinates': '2d' })"
